definition: Chikan district of Zhanjiang city 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 shi4], Guangdong
red/scarlet/bare/naked
old variant of 坎[kan3]/pit/hole
pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
Chikan district of Zhanjiang city 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Chikan is a relaxed town on the banks of a small river.
sentences.chinese: 赤坎镇位于一条小河边，是一个悠闲的小镇。

sentences.english: Walking around Chikan feels like walking through an old black and white picture postcard.
sentences.chinese: 行走在赤坎小镇，仿佛置身于古老的黑白照片中。

sentences.english: She said every student in Chikan will for ever remember expatriates" donation."
sentences.chinese: 她说赤坎每一个学生都总是会把华侨的资助铭记于心。
